blogs.description: A deep dive into Microsoft's revolutionary glass-based storage technology that uses plasma explosions to archive data for thousands of years.

research_trackers.name: IT-Bench and MAST: Diagnosing Enterprise Agent Failures
research_trackers.description: A collaborative research effort by IBM and UC Berkeley that provides a rigorous framework for understanding why AI agents fail in complex enterprise environments.

research_trackers.name: OpenAI First Proof Submissions
research_trackers.description: Primary research data showing how reasoning-based AI models attempt expert-level mathematical proofs, highlighting current capabilities and limitations.

tools.name: Unsloth AI Training Library
tools.description: An essential tool for developers looking to fine-tune LLMs with 2x more speed and 70% less memory, now integrated with Hugging Face for free training jobs.

tools.name: Claude Code
tools.description: A high-performance CLI tool for agentic coding that utilizes prompt caching to minimize latency and cost during complex development tasks.
